description: Their Pinnacle Surf Short - An elevated version of our Passage Series, the Passage Primo is exactly what you want when the swell beckons. Featuring welded seams for maximum stretch and no chafe, a vertical side pocket with waterproof zipper for ultimate comfort and lasercut leg openings, the new Passage Primo is everything you've wanted in a Roark surf short.
name: Roark Passage Primo Nocturnal Boardshorts, 18" Inseam - Mens
